type.name: date_or_date_time_item
type.description: This select is a place holder for assignments of a date or a date and time to elements of product data.

entity.name: Date_or_date_time_assignment
entity.description: A Date_or_date_time_assignment assigns a date or date and time to a date and time item.

explicit.name: assigned_date
explicit.description: the date or date and time to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: the function served by the date or date and time.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which date or date and time is assigned.
